about_the_game:
Officer data that can be used to introduce ancient officers into the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" scenario you choose to play.
Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited by using Manage Orig. Officers.

A total of 29 renowned and powerful figures taken from throughout the history of China is included in this set. The lineup will include well known historical figures such as famous ministers of Qin like Wang Jian, Meng Tian, and Li Si, the four lords of the Warring States Period, Lord Mengchang, Lord Xinling, Lord Pingyuan, and Lord Chunshen, as well as Chu's Qu Yuan, Fan Zeng and Ying Bu, Han's Huo Qubing, and more.
Enjoy playing "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" using famous powerful heroes and warlords from history.

▼Additional officers
Ying Bu, Fan Zeng, Huo Qubing, Bao Shuya, Meng Tian, Wang Jian, Li Si, Lu Buwei, Zhang Yi, Su Qin, Zhao Yong, Xiong Yi, Xiang Yan, Tian Ji, Tian Yinqi, Ji Ping, Wei Ying, Han Wu, Huang Xie, Tian Wen, Zhao Sheng, Wei Wuji, Pang Juan, Tian Dan, Zou Ji, Ju Xin, Guo Kui, Qu Ping, Gongshu Ban

▼How to Use
After selecting a scenario from "Start New->Select Scenario" screen, at the "Manage Orig. Officers" screen, use "Introduce Orig. Officer" to select an ancient officer. This will allow that officer to appear in the game.
Use "Position Orig. Officers" to place these officers at locations of your choice or even add them to an existing force.

A total of 29 renowned and powerful figures taken from throughout the history of China is included in this set. The lineup will include well known historical figures such as famous ministers of Qin like Wang Jian, Meng Tian, and Li Si, the four lords of the Warring States Period, Lord Mengchang, Lord Xinling, Lord Pingyuan, and Lord Chunshen, as well as Chu's Qu Yuan, Fan Zeng and Ying Bu, Han's Huo Qubing, and more.
Enjoy playing "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" using famous powerful heroes and warlords from history.

▼Additional officers

name: RTK14: "Ancient Officers" Officer Data Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended

short_description: Officer data that can be used to introduce ancient officers into the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" scenario you choose to play. Note: Officer data added with this DLC cannot be edited by using Manage Orig. Officers.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, English
*languages with full audio support
